name: Pizza Shop Hero Run - Maker of Pizza Cooking Game
name_original: Pizza Shop Hero Run - Maker of Pizza Cooking Game
description:
You are one of the numerous helpless husbands who is destined to fulfill his wife’s every wish, no matter what the cost. On a rather chilly night, she demands for a pizza. It’s raining outside and home deliveries are off. Awwww, the poor thing’s gonna have to run for it himself!


Run for your LIFE or there is an angry WIFE. Run as the husband on a mission in this endless runner for mobile. The quest for pizza is overhauled by a rainy night and a tough road back home. Start the pizza run and avoid the obstacles along the way to get the pizza back home, safe and sound. If not, well you might wanna turn back (Angry Wife at Home).


::Features::

- Super fun Quest for Pizza endless runner
- See how far you can take the husband back home
- Avoid obstacles along the road or the pizza crashes
- Use on screen controls to avoid high and low obstacles

::YOU DON’T WANNA MESS UP WITH THE WIFE::
Slide, roll, jump and strafe, but don’t let the pizza fall. Because it’s a long way back to the pizza shop.
